name: Astronomer, Inc.
description: Developer of a data orchestration platform designed to collect and prepare statistics for business analytics. The company's platform offers a suite of products and services to deploy, manage and scale distributed airflow assistance with isolated resource allocation, user access, and accounts, enabling data engineers, data scientists, and data analysts to build, run, and observe pipelines-as-code.
one_liner: Developer of a data orchestration platform designed to collect and prepare statistics for business analytics. The company's platform offers a suite of products and services to deploy, manage and scale distributed airflow assistance with isolated resource allocation, user access, and accounts, enabling data engineers, data scientists, and data analysts to build, run, and observe pipelines-as-code.
